name: Glomeria
description:
Glomeria is a 2D sandbox platformer game.

Or will be (if it ever makes it out of the prototyping stage, that is).

If it ever reaches Early-Access (after the prototyping stage), the game will be open-sourced. Up until that, please don't use the assets and stuff in your work.

More info to follow with later updates. 

How to play   On Windows:

Open "bin" and run Glomeria.exe.

On Linux:

Install libsdl2, libsdl2-mixer, and libsdl2-ttf.

Open "bin" and run Glomeria.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

E - Open inventory

F11 - Toggle fullscreen

Esc - Open exit menu

Planned features:

Diverse, vast worlds

Extensive lore

Mobs

Music

And a lot more. Only time will tell.

There isn't much yet, but I hope I can make it into something bigger. Please tell me if you see the slightest amount of potential. Enjoy.

-kritomas
